alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; Lexington; McCormick; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern McDuffie, Columbia, northwestern Burke, Richmond, central Edgefield, southwestern Lexington, northwestern Aiken, southeastern Saluda and southeastern McCormick Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Saluda to near Edgefield County Airport to near Camak. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Strom Thurmond Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Lexington, Grovetown, Evans, Thomson, Batesburg-Leesville, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Clearwater, Martinez, Aiken Mall, Belvedere, Edgefield, Hephzibah, Harlem, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Glendale and South Augusta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 175 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 51. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
